verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Before a potentially historic summit with President Trump and North Korea 's dictator] , [ARG0: one woman] [V: reminds] [ARG2: the world] [ARG1: of the conflict 's forgotten victims] .
Before a potentially historic summit with President Trump and North Korea 's dictator , one woman reminds the world of the conflict 's [V: forgotten] [ARG1: victims] .
